root.name: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties
root.description: This game was an adult themed 3DO and PC game, advertising full motion video, however most of the game is just audio and still pictures. The gameplay consists of making plot choices and seeing where they lead. Often the more vulgar the choice, the more chances you have to restart the scene. The game follows a man, presumably the titular plumber, and a woman looking for a job, as romantic hijinx ensue between them.
